div.p: RESIDENT a public miniſter, who manages the affairs of a kingdom or ſtate, at a foreign court.
They are a claſs of public miniſters inferior to arn-baffadυrs or envoys ; but, like them, are under the protection of the law of nations.
R.ES IDUE, the remainder or balance of an account, debt, or obligation.
